H0.text: The Washington Post reporters, Carl Bernstein and Bob Woodward, wrote an account of the Watergate scandal, published in 1974. What was the book called. All the President's Men

H1.text: The Washington Post reporters, Carl Bernstein and Bob Woodward, wrote an account of the Watergate scandal, published in 1974. What was the book called. The Watergate Files

H2.text: The Washington Post reporters, Carl Bernstein and Bob Woodward, wrote an account of the Watergate scandal, published in 1974. What was the book called. Abuse of Power

H3.text: The Washington Post reporters, Carl Bernstein and Bob Woodward, wrote an account of the Watergate scandal, published in 1974. What was the book called. Woodstein

A4.text: Woodward and Bernstein's 1974 book All the President's Men was adapted into a 1976 film of the same name
